Title: Aid Our Wounded
Description:
$n, our forces were not prepared for such an onslaught.

These djaradin fight with more furor than the forces we have faced in the past. We have wounded behind enemy lines.

If you possess knowledge of how to heal then I ask you employ it. If you do not, we have bandages to aid the wounded with. 

Please help bring our people out of the fire.
ObjectivesText: Heal 6 Wounded Guardians using the provided bandages or your own abilities.
